gameDetails.name: Flick 'em Up!: Stallion Canyon
gameDetails.description: What’s a cowboy without his horse, you ask? Well, ask no more for Flick 'em Up! Stallion Canyon, the first expansion for Flick 'em Up!, introduces dashing horses! Two cowgirls also join the gang amongst many new elements that will have you conquering brand new towns and scenarios for more flickin' fun!
